form.style: padding-top: 1vw; padding-bottom: 2vw; font-family: HiraginoSans-W6-83pv-RKSJ-H, Hiragino Sans;

table.style: margin: 0 auto; letter-spacing: 0.1em; font-size: 1.17vw; font-family: HiraKakuProN-W3-83pv-RKSJ-H, Hiragino Kaku Gothic ProN;

input.style: height: 2.3vw; width: 43.8vw; margin: 0.7vw; font-size: 1.17vw; border: 0.2vw solid #e4e4e4; border-radius: 0.5vw;
height: 2.3vw; width: 43.8vw; margin: 0.7vw; font-size: 1.17vw; border: 0.2vw solid #e4e4e4; border-radius: 0.5vw;

textarea.style: height: 11.6vw; width: 43.8vw; margin: 0.7vw; font-size: 1.17vw; border: 0.2vw solid #e4e4e4; border-radius: 0.5vw;

label.input: 個人情報の取扱いに同意する

button.name: submit
button.style: width: 29.2vw; height: 4.3vw; font-size: 1.17vw; letter-spacing: 0.3em; color: white; background-color: #83ccd2; border: 0; border-radius: 2.2vw; position: relative;
